plugins.name: Text Flow
plugins.description:
「Text Flow」は、指定したレイヤー名のテキストに用意したテキストを流し込むプラグインです。これで、テキストのコピペ地獄とはサヨナラ！Figmaでのデザイン作業をスピードアップすることができます。


  1. レイヤー名の設定：テキストを入力したいレイヤーに、共通の名前をつけます。
  2. テキストの準備：流し込みたいテキストを、改行で区切って準備します。
  3. 対象オブジェクトの選択：プラグインを起動し、テキストを適用したいグループやコンポーネントを選びます。
  4. 入力と適用：レイヤー名とテキストを入力して、「適用」ボタンをクリックします。
plugins.tagline: テキスト流し込みを効率化

plugins.name: GIF Boss
plugins.description:
Bring your designs to life with GIF Boss — the ultimate Figma plugin for creating powerful, customisable GIFs in seconds. Select a series of frames and transform them into smooth, high-quality animations with full control over:

  1. Timing & Looping – Set frame durations and loop styles with ease
  2. Reordering – Drag and drop to perfect your frame sequence
  3. Optimisation – Shrink file sizes without compromising quality
  4. Bulk Creation – Generate several GIFs simultaneously. Ideal for large campaign roll-outs with multiple animated banner ads of different dimensions
plugins.tagline: Simultaneous multi GIF generation.

136516.name: GIF Boss
136516.description:
Bring your designs to life with GIF Boss — the ultimate Figma plugin for creating powerful, customisable GIFs in seconds. Select a series of frames and transform them into smooth, high-quality animations with full control over:

  1. Timing & Looping – Set frame durations and loop styles with ease
  2. Reordering – Drag and drop to perfect your frame sequence
  3. Optimisation – Shrink file sizes without compromising quality
  4. Bulk Creation – Generate several GIFs simultaneously. Ideal for large campaign roll-outs with multiple animated banner ads of different dimensions

plugins.name: Typographica
plugins.description:
Typographica helps you quickly create beautiful and balanced font combinations for any project — from corporate dashboards to creative websites.


The plugin analyzes your chosen primary font, project style, and font metrics to generate harmonious font pairs automatically.


What does Typographica do?


  1. Generates Primary + Secondary + Accent font combinations
  2. Takes into account your project style (7 styles: business, corporate, modern, elegant, fun, personal, minimalist)
  3. Analyzes font metrics (x-height, glyph width, weight, stylistic characteristics)
  4. Automatically filters out fonts that do not fit the selected style
  5. Lets you save combinations as Figma text styles and variables
  6. Optionally adds smart descriptions to generated styles
  7. Supports manual swapping of secondary and accent fonts
  8. Works with any available fonts — Google Fonts, local fonts, and Figma-supported fonts


Who is it for?


  1. Product designers — to quickly build solid typography systems
  2. UX/UI designers — to improve readability and visual rhythm
  3. Brand designers — to find well-balanced and creative font pairs
  4. Beginners — to get guidance on what fonts work well together
  5. Experienced designers — to save time and explore unexpected combinations


How does it work?


  1. Choose your project style
  2. Select a Primary Font
  3. Click Change Pairs
  4. Browse the generated font pairs and accent options
  5. Save styles or variables in one click
  6. Tweak and refine as needed


Why use Typographica?


Save time — no more manual font pairing

Get better quality — pairs are based on font metrics and style fit, not guesswork

Flexible — works for classic and modern designs alike

Customizable — easy to adjust pairs or generate new ones on the fly


Styles and Tokens Support


Typographica not only generates font pairs, but also helps you create full-fledged text styles and design tokens in Figma.


You can save your Primary, Secondary, and Accent fonts as reusable Text Styles and optionally as Variables (Tokens) — making your typography consistent across your project and design system.


Style Description Table


Typographica can automatically generate a style description table for your font system — right inside Figma.


It creates a clear, editable table summarizing your Primary, Secondary, and Accent fonts, with suggested usage and style notes.


Perfect for documenting typography choices or sharing with your team and developers.


Typographica is your smart font pairing assistant in Figma. Make your typography cleaner, more beautiful, and more consistent — with less effort.

accepted.name: Andrei Kuznetsov
accepted.description: Templates, UI Kits, Design Systems, Plugins

plugins.tagline: Smart Font Pair Generator for Figma

plugins.name: Hints
plugins.description:
Hints is an AI-powered Figma plugin that helps you quickly rename, group, and restructure your layers using smart, semantic naming and auto-layout suggestions.

> - Instantly rename layers with AI (Qwen) based on design context

> - Group and organize layers by semantic prefixes

> - Preview and apply auto-layout frames with smart direction and spacing

> - Works with Figma’s latest auto-layout features

> - Great for design systems, handoff, and large files

>

> Save time, reduce manual work, and keep your Figma files organized and developer-friendly!
plugins.tagline: AI-powered Figma layer renamer Design system assistant & auto-layout assistant

plugins.name: Skeema
plugins.description:
What is Skeema?

Skeema is a Figma plugin that integrates API documentation directly into your design workspace. It allows frontend developers and designers to access API schemas for specific design components, making it easier to align designs with backend structures and speed up the development process.


How does Skeema work?

It connects your Figma designs to the relevant API documentation. By clicking on a design element, you can instantly view the associated endpoint documentation, eliminating the need to search through long API docs.


Who is Skeema for?

This plugin is designed for frontend and backend developers, and teams who work with API-driven applications. It helps bridge the gap between design and development, making UI-based API integration and collaboration smoother and more efficient.


What are the key benefits of using Skeema?

  1. 🚀 Faster API integration: No more switching between tools. Get API docs directly inside Figma.
  2. 🎯 Better accuracy: Ensure your design components match the API structures, reducing development errors.
  3. 👩‍💻 Streamlined collaboration: Designers and developers stay aligned, minimizing back-and-forth communication.


Do I need technical skills to use Skeema?

While Skeema is built with developers in mind, it's intuitive enough for designers to use as well. Its UI is designed to seamlessly integrate into your existing Figma workflow, making it accessible for anyone involved in the design and development process.


What APIs does Skeema support?

Skeema is designed to work with OpenAPI (Swagger) specifications, but it can support a wide range of RESTful APIs. As long as your API has proper documentation, Skeema can link it to your Figma designs.


Is Skeema free?

Skeema offers both a free version with basic features and a premium version with advanced features such as team collaboration, extended API support, and priority access to updates.


Can I use Skeema with my team?

Yes! Skeema is built for collaborative teams. You can easily share API-linked designs with your development team, ensuring that everyone stays on the same page and works with the latest API documentation.
plugins.tagline: Skeema integrates API documentation directly into your design workspace. Simply click to view docs.

plugins.name: figma-text-css
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you extract CSS styles from a selected text layer in Figma.

Get accurate font-weight, font-size, color, line-height, and letter-spacing instantly, formatted in pure CSS.


Perfect for developers and designers who want a fast way to turn styled text into usable web code.


💡 Features:

- Auto-generate CSS for font properties

- RGB to HEX color conversion

- Automatically cleans text by removing line breaks

- Works on selection change for a smooth workflow
plugins.tagline: Instantly copy font styles as CSS

plugins.name: Smart Accessibility Checker
plugins.description: Ensure your designs are accessible and inclusive with the Smart Accessibility Checker! This Figma plugin scans for contrast issues, touch target sizes, font readability, and color-blindness concerns—helping you create user-friendly designs effortlessly. Get instant AI suggested insights and basic fixes to improve accessibility in real-time! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Design with Clarity: Smarter, Accessible, Inclusive 🚀

128248.name: Smart Accessibility Checker
128248.description: Ensure your designs are accessible and inclusive with the Smart Accessibility Checker! This Figma plugin scans for contrast issues, touch target sizes, font readability, and color-blindness concerns—helping you create user-friendly designs effortlessly. Get instant AI suggested insights and basic fixes to improve accessibility in real-time! 🚀
128248.release_notes:
🔧 Version 3.0 – Now with Auto-Fix!
We’re back with a powerful update! 🎉

🆕 What’s New in v3.0
✨ Auto-Fix for Font Size
Text nodes that fall below accessibility standards are automatically updated to a minimum readable size of 12px.

✨ Auto-Fix for Touch Targets
Interactive elements smaller than 48x48 px are now automatically resized to meet accessibility guidelines for tap targets.

These improvements help you stay WCAG-compliant with just one click. Perfect for speeding up your design workflow while ensuring usability for all.
128248.tagline: Design with Clarity: Smarter, Accessible, Inclusive 🚀

plugins.name: Little Bro
plugins.description:
Your Personal Design Mentor for Growth, Confidence, and Impact

Little Bro is the ultimate tool for designers who want to elevate their craft and make a real impact. Whether you're a junior designer, freelancer, or aspiring creative, Little Bro provides the mentorship and tools you need to thrive in your design journey.


  1. Instant Feedback on UX and Usability: Get real-time insights into your designs with usability simulations that help you identify pain points and improve user satisfaction.
  2. Accessibility Standards Made Simple: Ensure your designs are inclusive and meet accessibility standards effortlessly, making your work usable for everyone.
  3. Overcome Creative Blocks: Stay inspired and productive with strategies to spark creativity and keep your projects moving forward.
  4. Refine Your Presentation Skills: Learn to articulate your design decisions with clarity and confidence, helping you win over clients, teams, and stakeholders.
  5. Continuous Skill Development: With guidance refined by senior, staff, and director-level UI/UX and product designers, Little Bro helps you grow into the confident, skilled designer you aspire to be.


Little Bro is more than just a tool—it's your partner in mastering the art of UI/UX. From instant feedback to accessibility and usability insights, Little Bro is here to help you create designs that are not only beautiful but also functional and impactful.


Join a community of designers transforming their careers with Little Bro and unlock your full potential today.
plugins.tagline: A companion to help you design better, faster, and smarter

plugins.name: Turtles
plugins.description:
Turtles is a simple utility to that selects every layer under your selected layer. When working on mobile UI this is a cumbersome task. No more!


  1. Select a layer
  2. Run "Turtles"

114550.name: Turtles

plugins.name: Mavity Figma Plugin
plugins.description: The plugin is a tailored tool designed to convert web pages into Figma designs with specific adjustments for seamless integration with Mavity. It works by using a Chrome extension to extract the structure and elements of a web page, converting them into a JSON format. This JSON is then processed by the plugin, which translates it into an editable design within Figma, ensuring compatibility and efficiency for Mavity workflows.
plugins.tagline: Converts web pages to Figma designs using a Chrome extension and JSON transformation.

plugins.name: iMessage AI Chat Builder
plugins.description:
Accelerate your design workflow with an AI-powered plugin that integrates seamlessly with the iMessage Chat Builder UI kit. Use this plugin to instantly generate realistic iMessage screens and prototypes.


Using this plugin will allow you to configure the following chat properties:

  1. The number of chat participants
  2. The maximum number of messages in the chat
  3. Whether iMessage should default to light or dark mode
  4. The conversation topic and tone


Getting Started

To get started, follow these quick steps:


1. Install required fonts and symbols

This plugin uses Apple’s SF Pro and SF Mono font families - in addition to SF Symbols.


These fonts are not bundled with this file. SF Pro should now work natively within Figma’s desktop client, but you’ll still need to download and install SF Mono manually if you haven’t already done so.


2. Generate and enter an Anthropic API key

To use the plugin - you’ll need an Anthropic API key.


You can get one by:

  1. Visiting the Anthropic Console
  2. Signing in or creating an account
  3. Navigating to the API Key section of your account settings
  4. Clicking ‘Create Key’


Paste that API key into the plugin when prompted. Your key is stored locally and never shared.


Note: Anthropic may charge for API usage. Review Anthropic’s API pricing before proceeding with plugin use.


---


This plugin is not affiliated with or endorsed by Apple Inc, Figma Inc, or Anthropic PBC.

accepted.name: Pat Dugan
accepted.description: Front front, back back, sucker grab a snack pack.

plugins.tagline: Create convincing iMessage prototypes using AI. Turn ideas into iMessage prototypes instantly.

plugins.name: Component State Mapper
plugins.description:
Tired of getting lost in complex component variants? Struggling to track every possible state, prevent design inconsistencies, and explain component logic to your team?


Introducing State Mapper, the essential Figma plugin that transforms your complex component sets into clear, interactive, and easy-to-understand visual maps. Stop navigating your variants blindfolded and gain a bird's-eye view of your entire component architecture.


With a single click, State Mapper instantly generates a live flowchart of all your variants, showing you exactly how they connect and what properties change between them.


Key Features:


  2. 🗺️ Instant Visual Mapping: Automatically generate beautiful, easy-to-read diagrams from any component set. See the full picture, from simple buttons to complex data tables.
  3. 🔬 Powerful Filtering & Layouts: Is your map too complex? No problem. Isolate exactly what you need by filtering properties and values. Switch between Hierarchical, Graph, and Matrix layouts to find the perfect view.
  4. ⚠️ Smart "Missing State" Detection: Our most powerful feature! State Mapper intelligently analyzes your component's properties and automatically flags potential "holes" or missing variants in your system, helping you prevent bugs before they happen.
  5. 🤝 Seamless Handoff & Documentation: Export your component maps as SVG or PNG to include them directly in your documentation on Confluence, Notion, or Jira. Make sure developers understand the logic perfectly.
  6. 🔄 Live Sync: Keep your map updated in real-time. As you add, remove, or change variants, your map reflects those changes instantly.

Who is it for?


State Mapper is built for meticulous Product Designers, UI/UX Designers, and Design System teams who want to build more robust, error-free, and well-documented components.


Install State Mapper today and bring order, clarity, and intelligence to your design system!

accepted.name: 0mid madah
accepted.description: Product Designer by trade, problem-solver by nature. I build bridges between human needs and digital solutions, one pixel at a time.

plugins.tagline: Bring clarity to component chaos.

plugins.name: Figma to Unity Exporter
plugins.description:
### Tired of manually recreating your Figma designs in Unity?


Figma To Unity Importer is the ultimate workflow solution designed to bridge the gap between designers and developers. Stop wasting hours meticulously rebuilding UI and start converting your high-fidelity Figma designs into fully functional, native Unity uGUI components with just a few clicks.


**⚠️ IMPORTANT: This is one half of a powerful 2-part system.**

This Figma plugin exports your design data. To bring your designs to life in Unity, you need the professional importer asset from the Unity Asset Store.


---


### **➡️ Step 1: Get the Professional Unity Importer Asset**


To complete the workflow, please purchase and import the required companion asset from the Unity Asset Store. It's the engine that powers the entire import process in Unity, packed with advanced features to ensure a perfect conversion.


**[>> Get "Figma To Unity Importer" on the Unity Asset Store ($15) <<](https://assetstore.unity.com/preview/323342/1075296)**


---


### **✨ Key Features:**


* **Accurate Conversion:** Preserves layer hierarchy, names, positions, sizes, and rotations.

* **Advanced Text Support:** Exports text as TextMeshPro components, maintaining font family, **font weight (including variable fonts)**, size, and color.

* **Image Export:** Automatically exports image fills and creates native Unity `Image` components.

* **Resolution Scaling:** Scale your entire UI to different screen sizes automatically.

* **Smart & Simple UI:** Remembers your last used settings and supports multiple languages.


### **🚀 Workflow:**


**1. In Unity (Setup):**

* Purchase and import the importer from the Asset Store using the link above.

* Install the required packages as described in the asset's documentation (TextMeshPro, UI, Newtonsoft.Json).


**2. In Figma (Export):**

* Run this plugin.

* Select the single, top-level Frame you want to export.

* Configure your options (target resolution, include images, etc.).

* Click "Export" to download the `.zip` file.


**3. In Unity (Import):**

* Unzip the downloaded file.

* Drag the `FigmaExport` folder into your Unity `Assets`.

* Open the importer via `Tools > Figma Importer`.

* Assign the `hierarchy.json` file and click "Create UI".


That's it! Your design is now a native, ready-to-use UI in Unity.
plugins.tagline: The ultimate workflow bridge. Go from Figma design to a working Unity UI in minutes.

plugins.name: АвтоГрамоты | AutoGramoty
plugins.description:
Зачем нужен?

Если ты устал заполнять кучу грамот-сертификатов-благодарностей вручную, то этот плагин спасет тебя.

Несколько нажатий вместо нескольких часов


Как пользоваться?

  1. Добавьте маркер в виде текста {{ФИО}} на фрейм
  2. Выделите весь фрейм
  3. Запустите АвтоГрамоты
  4. Введите текст маркера
  5. Введите значения
  6. Нажмите "Создать"


Предложения принимаются в личке


How to use?

  1. Add a marker in the form of text {{KEY} to the frame
  2. Select the entire frame
  3. Launch AutoGramoty
  4. Enter the marker text
  5. Enter the values
  6. Click "Create"
plugins.tagline: Устал делать кучу грамот? Плагин решит твою проблему!

137420.name: АвтоГрамоты | AutoGramoty

  3. Запустите АвтоГрамоты
  4. Введите текст маркера
  5. Введите значения
  6. Нажмите "Создать"

  2. Select the entire frame

  4. Enter the marker text

  6. Click "Create"
137420.release_notes:
🤓Йоу, первое большое обновление:

- Переработан концепт: теперь вы сами указываете текстовые маркеры и их может быть
н е с к о л ь к о
- Обновлен дизайн
- Можно управлять сеткой
- Добавлена инструкция

137420.tagline: Устал делать кучу грамот? Плагин решит твою проблему!

plugins.name: ProtoFlow – Offline Clickable Prototypes
plugins.description:
💡 Cos'è ProtoFlow?

ProtoFlow è un plugin gratuito per Figma che ti permette di esportare un prototipo interattivo cliccabile in locale, in formato HTML + PNG. Nessun hosting, nessuna connessione internet necessaria. Basta un browser.


Perfetto per:


Test utente su dispositivi embedded


Demo da inviare ai clienti


Presentazioni offline


Contesti in cui Figma non è accessibile


🚀 Come funziona


Seleziona uno o più frame da esportare.


Scegli il frame di partenza.


Risolvi eventuali errori o warning.


Clicca “Scarica prototipo”.


Viene generato un archivio .zip con:


start.html: il file principale da aprire in locale


screens/: la cartella con tutte le schermate e i file HTML


README.txt: guida completa all’utilizzo


🧠 Come sono gestite le interazioni?


Ogni collegamento tra frame in Figma diventa un link cliccabile nella pagina HTML.


Gli elementi con Navigate To + Instant vengono interpretati come hotspot.


Anche un’intera schermata può essere interattiva.


📦 Cosa contiene il file ZIP?


start.html: la pagina iniziale del prototipo


screens/: tutte le schermate in PNG + HTML per ogni frame


README.txt: istruzioni complete all’uso, anche per utenti non tecnici


⚠️ Importante: non rinominare o spostare screens/, né i file .html o .png, altrimenti i collegamenti si romperanno.


📘 Istruzioni integrate

Nel tab "Istruzioni" del plugin trovi una guida dettagliata. Puoi anche consultare il file README.txt incluso nell’archivio per avere una versione offline, utile da condividere con il tuo team o clienti.


🔐 Nessun dato viene inviato online.

Tutto il processo avviene localmente nel tuo browser. Le immagini e i file generati non lasciano mai il tuo computer.


👨‍💻 Creato da

Francesco Cerisano (Havas Milan)
plugins.tagline: Esporta prototipi cliccabili offline da Figma in HTML+PNG. Perfetto per test e demo

plugins.name: Swap Dimensions
plugins.description:
Missing the quick frame orientation swap button from the old Figma UI?

This plugin brings that handy feature back—fast and simple!


Swap Dimensions is a lightweight Figma plugin that lets you instantly flip the dimensions of any selected frame — from portrait to landscape or vice versa.


It also updates the Auto Layout direction accordingly, switching between horizontal and vertical when needed.


🪄 Perfect for responsive design, prototyping, or quickly testing layouts in different orientations — with a single click.


No UI, no setup — just select a frame and run the plugin.
plugins.tagline: The missing frame orientation toggle from Figma's old UI — back in one click.

136052.name: Swap Dimensions
136052.description:
Missing the quick frame orientation swap button from the old Figma UI?

This plugin brings that handy feature back—fast and simple!


Swap Dimensions is a lightweight Figma plugin that lets you instantly flip the dimensions of any selected frame — from portrait to landscape or vice versa.


It also updates the Auto Layout direction accordingly, switching between horizontal and vertical when needed.


🪄 Perfect for responsive design, prototyping, or quickly testing layouts in different orientations — with a single click.


No UI, no setup — just select a frame and run the plugin.
136052.tagline: The missing frame orientation toggle from Figma's old UI — back in one click.

Save time, spark creativity, and solve design challenges with an AI partner that speaks your language.

133084.description:
Transform your Figma workflow with Figue, the AI assistant that understands design.


Analyze frames, generate text variations, create images, and receive expert UI/UX advice through natural conversations.


Whether you need fresh content ideas, design feedback, or visual assets, Figue brings the power of GPT-4o directly into your design process.


Save time, spark creativity, and solve design challenges with an AI partner that speaks your language.
133084.release_notes: Improvement in language management and small fixes
133084.tagline: Your AI design partner inside Figma, transforming UI/UX workflows through smart conversations.

plugins.name: Disable "Clip content"
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin that disables the “Clip content” property on supported layers – either across the entire file or just the selected ones. Originally built for internal use at DevExpress, it helps reduce noise in exported SVGs by removing unnecessary <clipPath> wrappers and keeping the markup clean.


Repo: https://github.com/alexfi1in/figma-disable-clip-content
plugins.tagline: A simple plugin to turn off “Clip content” on selected layers or throughout the entire file.

133693.name: Disable "Clip content"
133693.description:
A Figma plugin that disables the “Clip content” property on supported layers – either across the entire file or just the selected ones. Originally built for internal use at DevExpress, it helps reduce noise in exported SVGs by removing unnecessary <clipPath> wrappers and keeping the markup clean.


Repo: https://github.com/alexfi1in/figma-disable-clip-content
133693.release_notes:
– Improved logging: the path to each modified clipsContent node is now printed in a structured, readable format with icons.
– Skipped clipsContent updates for INSTANCE nodes to avoid errors.
133693.tagline: A simple plugin to turn off “Clip content” on selected layers or throughout the entire file.

plugins.name: Pager
plugins.description:
Design-Ready File Templates in Seconds

Stop rebuilding your file structure every time.

Pager helps you spin up clean, structured Figma files with reusable templates built from your own component libraries or ours.


Whether you're starting a new product flow, setting up for research, or handing off to devs, Pager gives you a smart starting point so you can focus on design, not setup.


With Pager, you can:

Import full-page layouts from your published library components


  1. Use default templates for wireframes, UI, research, and more
  2. Create dynamic templates with text, boolean, and variant controls (Pro)
  3. Build faster with consistent, scalable structure


No setup? No problem.

Start from scratch or pick a default template.

Upgrade to Pager Pro anytime to sync your own library and automate your team’s workflow.


📚 View Documentation

🧩 Explore Example Templates
plugins.tagline: Go from blank canvas to design-ready in seconds.

plugins.name: Variant Randomizer
plugins.description:
Tired of manually clicking through component variants one by one just to create visual variety in your mockups? Variant Randomizer is here to help! This simple yet powerful Figma plugin lets you instantly randomize the variants applied to multiple selected components or instances that have more than one variant option.


How it Works:

Select multiple elements (components/instances) on your canvas.

Run the [Plugin Name] plugin.

Done! The plugin automatically assigns a random variant to each selected element that has multiple variants available. Elements with only one variant or no variants will be ignored.


Why use Variant Randomizer?

Save Valuable Time: Stop the tedious process of manually changing variants across many elements.

Create Realistic Mockups: Quickly add natural variation to lists, grids, user avatars, button states, icons, and more.

Boost Productivity: Perfect for working with design systems and large sets of components.

Simple & Fast: One-click operation after selection.

Works on Selection: Target only the elements you need to change.



You can help me mantain this plugin by Buying me a coffee!
plugins.tagline: nstantly randomize component variants across your selection.

plugins.name: selection-text-styles
plugins.description: 選択済みのNODEに含まれるTEXTを text-style ごとにまとめて選択することができます。選択した TEXT は figma の機能で style をまとめて変更することができます。mixedになっているものはまとめてmixed扱いになるので複数のtext-styleを一つのTEXTに設定している場合にはまとめて変更は行いにくいです。
plugins.tagline: 選択済みのNODEに含まれるTEXTを text-style ごとにまとめて選択することができます

plugins.name: SuperLayer (copy)
plugins.description:
SuperLayer (copy) lets you quickly view and copy the names of selected layers in your Figma file or FigJam board. It’s ideal for generating UI inventories, documentation, or simply organizing your layer structure. The plugin also shows each layer’s type and a thumbnail preview when available.


To use it, select one or more layers on your canvas and launch the plugin. A clean list view will appear with sorting options and checkboxes to include or exclude layers. Click the Copy button to copy all selected layer names to your clipboard, formatted line by line. The list updates automatically as you change your selection.


SuperLayer is optimized for speed and simplicity. It does not currently support exporting full metadata, nested hierarchy structures, or annotations. Thumbnails are generated when possible, but may not appear for certain FigJam elements or complex Figma nodes.
plugins.tagline: Copy Figma and FigJam layer names with ease. Sortable and perfect for docs, audits, and checklists

Click the Copy button to copy all selected layer names to your clipboard, formatted line by line. The list updates automatically as you change your selection.

plugins.name: SVG Hell Yeah!
plugins.description:
666% more evil. 0% outlined text.


🔥 Export SVGs with Figma variables

💀 Keep your text unflattened, unholy

🩸 Sacrifice ids, groups, and other sins

🧨 Prettify the chaos into clean, readable code


Summon. Optimize. Burn.

Your SVGs shall rise... from hell.


Source code: https://github.com/PavelLaptev/figma-svg-export
